com.guardtime.envelope.packaging

Class SignatureContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guardtime.envelope.packaging.SignatureContent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Comparable<SignatureContent>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExtendedSignatureContent, VerifiedSignatureContent

    public class SignatureContent
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable, Comparable<SignatureContent>
    Structure that groups together all envelope internal structure elements (manifests), documents, annotations and signatures that are directly connected to the signature.

    • Method Detail

      • getDocuments

        public Map<String,Document> getDocuments()
        Returns:
        Map containing the Document contained by the structure, and the document's name.

      • getAnnotations

        public Map<String,Annotation> getAnnotations()
        Returns:
        Map containing the Annotations contained by the structure, and the paths to the annotation. Path is used for envelope management.

      • getEnvelopeSignature

        public EnvelopeSignature getEnvelopeSignature()
        Returns:
        The EnvelopeSignature which signs the structure and its contents.

      • getDocumentsManifest

        public DocumentsManifest getDocumentsManifest()
        Returns:
        The DocumentsManifest contained by the structure.

      • getAnnotationsManifest

        public AnnotationsManifest getAnnotationsManifest()
        Returns:
        The AnnotationsManifest contained by the structure.

      • getManifest

        public Manifest getManifest()
        Returns:
        The structure's Manifest.

      • getSingleAnnotationManifests

        public Map<String,SingleAnnotationManifest> getSingleAnnotationManifests()

      • attachDetachedDocument

        public boolean attachDetachedDocument(String path,
                                      InputStream data,
                                      DocumentFactory documentFactory)
        Attaches data to a detached Document.
        Parameters:
        path - path of the Document to attach the data to.
        data - data stream to be attached to the Document. NB! Does NOT close the stream!
        Returns:
        True, after successful attachment.

      • detachDocument

        public Document detachDocument(String path,
                               DocumentFactory documentFactory)
                        throws ParsingStoreException
        Parameters:
        path - path of the Document.
        Returns:
        Existing Document if present, and replaces it with an EmptyDocument in the SignatureContent. If no document found or if the document is already detached, null will be returned.
        Throws:
        ParsingStoreException - when detaching an instance of Document fails.
